citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
One gray fox still has a yellow discharge from both eyes. The skin around both eyes had areas that were bright pink with
hair loss. The globe of each eye was also grayish blue with a cloudy appearance. The veterinarian who was contacted to
provide veterinary care was not experienced with treating a fox and declined to examine or provide instructions for
treating the eyes.
Lack of veterinary diagnosis and treatment can lead to prolonged suffering and pain.
Each dealer shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care including the use of appropriate methods
to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries.
Each exhibitor must contact the attending veterinarian for proper diagnosis and treatment of all veterinary issues.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Kristin Ray, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Jennifer Walker, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
One gray fox still has a yellow discharge from both eyes. The skin around both eyes had areas that were bright pink with 
hair loss. The globe of each eye was also grayish blue with a cloudy appearance. The veterinarian who was contacted to 
provide veterinary care was not experienced with treating a fox and declined to examine or provide instructions for 
treating the eyes. 
Lack of veterinary diagnosis and treatment can lead to prolonged suffering and pain. 
Each dealer shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care including the use of appropriate methods 
to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries. 
Each exhibitor must contact the attending veterinarian for proper diagnosis and treatment of all veterinary issues. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Kristin Ray, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Jennifer Walker, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
